biotools.summary: CSTminer searches for Conserved Sequence Tags (CST) in pairwise comparisons of genomic sequences.  Output is a graphical map showing the location of CSTs overlayed with known Ensembl exons and ESTs. A scoring system reflects coding or non-coding potential of these conserved blocks.

bioschemas.name: CSTminer
